评论概述: Good for organizing/ bad for shaping
评论详情: I saw a reel from a blogger advertising this organizer to provide support and  shape to the LV  PM carry all bag, it doesn’t !! and since the color is kind of dark (matches the inner fabricI). I  can hardly find stuff inside my bag. Price is also high
The color is exactly like my LV PURSE!

评论概述: The color is a perfect match
评论详情: I liked the color of the insert; it matches the lining of my LV bag perfectly.  I wish it had more pockets like some of the felt inserts/organizers that are available on Amazon to keep things from touching each other.  Again, the color is a perfect match, the pockets are not deep enough and there is not enough of a barrier to keep things like keys and sharp things away from rubbing against my wallet. The other thing that was disappointing was that although the velvet is fabulous, it is not firm enough to keep the LV bag from sagging.The pluses are that this company ships extremely quickly, the color is fabulous, and it has a zipper at the top to keep things from spilling out of my bag.  I am going to keep it because it is a quality product, the velvet is soft and matches my bag perfectly.  The only drawbacks are that it needs more pockets and/or dividers.

This is the 2nd try to get an insert for my new carryall, as the 1st one from another brand didn’t fit very well. Let me tell you, this is a great choice, perfect size on all 3 dimensions. Color is super close to the inside liner. The zipper, the material, all together makes me so happy, can’t wait to write this review and share with everyone. I also ordered Oaikor brand for my Gucci bag insert, same exact great experience. Highly recommend Oaikor!

Fits inside the Carryall PM like a glove! The color is not an exact match but very close. The material is so nice and soft, and the zipper is like butter. Love that it has a zipper for extra security since the carryall only has magnetic closure.
